biotools.summary: epitopepredict is a programmatic framework and command line tool designed to aid the process of T cell epitope prediction. It provides access to multiple binding prediction algorithms under a single interface and scales for whole genomes using multiple target MHC alleles. A web interface is provided to assist visualisation and filtering of the results.
